name: Radar (zoromoth)
description:
Radar was one of the greatest machines of the cold war. It completely changed the face of the war. Nothing was unsafe!!!

It is the 90's height of cold war between blue stripes and red star nation. One nation had a volley of missiles whereas the other had the "RADAR" and counter-missile unit. You will play as the lead controller controlling the radar. Strategize to kill all your enemies. Beware, any mistakes will be costly!!! 

The game has the following features:

1. Completely made in OLC Pixel Game Engine.

2. Source code attached.

3. Minimalistic programatically generated art

4. 30 min game play

Please give a rating if you liked the game! Be sure to comment on the quality or bugs (if any). I will make the changes...

THE SOURCE CODE DOES NOT INCLUDE THE IMAGES AS THEY ARE PROTECTED. YOU CAN STILL EXECUTE IT. IT IS A VISUAL STUDIO 2019 PROJECT...

ALSO PLEASE DO NOT USE THE ICONS IN THE INSTALL FOLDER. I PURCHASED THEM AND THEY ARE COPYRIGHT PROTECTED
